Package graphanalyzer.view.panels

Class GraphPanel

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • graphanalyzer.view.panels.GraphPanel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible
    public class GraphPanel
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    Panel that is used to draw the actual graph visualization.

    As this is a non final product that is still in development the panel only allows draeing of six different vertices. But as the main purpose of the whole application is just to visualize a given graph algorithm it is not important to support any given graph. The provided example graphs fit this restriction as they only contain six graphs

    Author:
    paulehler
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • calculateVertexCoordinates

        private void calculateVertexCoordinates()
        Calculate the coordinates for all vertices of the graph.

        At the present time the visualization of the graph only works for six vertices. As long as no intelligent layouting is implemented the vertices will get placed in a hexagonal shape to guarantee a non competing placing. That way the drawn displayed graph will always look pretty without any interfering graph positions. 

         The points are calculated by dividing the panels width by 5 and the height by 4. This will result in a grid.
 The points get placed on this grid as follows:
 . . . . . .    
 . . o o . .    height / 4
 . o . . o .    height / 2
 . . o o . .    height / 4 * 3
 . . . . . .    
   | | | |-> width / 5 * 4
   | | |-> width / 5 * 3
   | |-> width / 5 * 2
   |-> width / 5

      • shouldDrawTransposed

        public void shouldDrawTransposed​(boolean showTransposedEdges)
        Decides if the given graph or transposed graph should be displayed.

        If true, the transposed graph will be drawn at next invoke of paintComponent(Graphics) method. Else the original graph is drawn.

        Parameters:
        showTransposedEdges - boolean to decide if transposed graph should be displayed

      • reverseEdges

        @Deprecated(forRemoval=true)
public void reverseEdges()
        Deprecated, for removal: This API element is subject to removal in a future version.
        ("better" solution has been found to display transposed graph at #shouldDrawTransposed())
        Change edge orientation of all components in edgeComponents
